title: President Rajapaksa declares open the 58th CPA Conference in Colombo
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma from London (Pix by: Sudath Silva) President Mahinda Rajapaksa officially inaugurated the 58th Commonwealth Parliamentary Association (CPA) Conference at the Nelum Pokuna Mahinda Rajapaksa Performance Arts Theatre this morning on 11 September.
